mapper.select: SELECT order_id, user_account, order_date, address1, address2, address3, receiver_name, receiver_phone FROM Orders WHERE user_account = #{userAccount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Orders (address1, address2, address3, receiver_name, receiver_phone) VALUE (#{address1}),(#{address2}),(#{address3}),(#{receiverName}),(#{receiverPhone})
